summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Mount Baker Park Addition, and in Block "B", Pettit's Mount Baker Park Addition, being the alley between 30th Avenue South and 31st Avenue South, from College Street to 31st Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9825 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
